com.sap.cloud.sdk.datamodel.messaging.core

Class MessagingVdmConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.datamodel.messaging.core.MessagingVdmConverter
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class MessagingVdmConverter
extends Object
    Converter for turning plain string message payloads into Messaging VDM objects. This relies on MessageFactoryMapper objects to pick the right MessageFactory based on the message type. Multiple MessageFactoryMapper objects can be configured, and each MessageFactoryMapper can have mappings for the same message type. In this case, the mapping of the most recently added MessageFactoryMapper is used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessagingVdmConverter

        public MessagingVdmConverter(@Nonnull
                             MessageFactoryMapper... messageFactoryMappers)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a converter instance with the provided MessageFactoryMapper instances. Note that in case of duplicate mappings, the one from the right-most MessageFactoryMapper will be used.
        Parameters:
        messageFactoryMappers - Mapping classes that implement the MessageFactoryMapper interface and map message types to message factory class names.

    • Method Detail

        Deprecated. 
        Augment existing converter with provided MessageFactoryMapper instances. Note that in case of duplicate mappings, the one from the right-most MessageFactoryMapper will be used.
        Parameters:

      • fromMessage

        @Nonnull
public Message fromMessage(@Nonnull
                                    String payload)
                             throws MessagingException
        Deprecated. 
        Translates plain string message payloads into Messaging VDM objects.
        Parameters:
        payload - The original message payload.
        Returns:
        A Messaging VDM object representation of the original message.
        Throws:
        MessagingException - If there are problems converting the original message into a Messaging VDM object.
